p:
We placed a weakly informative Gaussian prior on the mean intercept <a> (Eq. ( 15)) and a weakly informative Student-T prior on the mean effect sizes <b
i > (Eq. ( 16)):
15

⟨ a ⟩ ~ Normal
0 , 1
16

b
j
